name: MessageFactory_createConnectErrorResponseTest
description: Unit tests for the MessageFactory.createConnectErrorResponse method.

test_cases.name: testCreateConnectErrorResponse_withErrorCode
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Connect Error Response with a specific error code.

test_cases.name: testCreateConnectErrorResponse_withNullReasonPhrase
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Connect Error Response with a specific error code and checks if it is an error response.
